name: @htsc/eslint-plugin
description: generates axios clients and request/response zod schemas for apis that adhere to openapi spec
author: @FoHoOV

scripts.open-api:generate:linux: rm -rf ./src/lib/generated-client && env-cmd pnpm run open-api:generate:shared && env-cmd pnpm run open-api:zod:linux
scripts.open-api:generate:windows: (rmdir /s /q .\src\lib\generated-client || dir) && env-cmd pnpm run open-api:generate:shared && env-cmd pnpm run open-api:zod:windows
scripts.open-api:zod:linux: mkdir -p ./src/lib/generated-client/zod && typed-openapi $PUBLIC_API_URL/openapi.json -o ./src/lib/generated-client/zod/schemas.ts --runtime zod && pnpm run open-api:zod:shared
scripts.open-api:zod:windows: mkdir .\src\lib\generated-client\zod && typed-openapi %PUBLIC_API_URL%/openapi.json -o ./src/lib/generated-client/zod/schemas.ts --runtime zod && pnpm run open-api:zod:shared
